statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Coffee' OR allergies IS NULL
SELECT id, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY favorite_drink
SELECT name, allergies FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink != 'Tea'
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE allergies IS NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink IN ('Coffee', 'Tea') ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Espresso' AND allergies LIKE '%dairy%'
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY favorite_drink DESC, name DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drinks WHERE drink_name = 'Coffee';
SELECT drink_name, drink_id FROM drinks ORDER BY drink_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE allergies IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, favorite_drink, allergies FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Coffee' OR favorite_drink = 'Tea';
SELECT customer_name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink LIKE '%Espresso%';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM drinks ORDER BY drink_name DESC;
SELECT favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, name, allergies FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Coffee';
SELECT name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE allergies @> ARRAY['Milk'];
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink IN ('Coffee', 'Tea');
SELECT customer_id, name, allergies FROM customer_profiles WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(allergies) > 0;
SELECT drinks.drink_name, customer_profiles.name FROM drinks JOIN customer_profiles ON drinks.drink_name = customer_profiles.favorite_drink;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink='Coffee';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, allergies FROM customer_profiles WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.first_name, d.drink_name, d.description FROM customer_profiles c JOIN customer_drinks cd ON c.customer_id = cd.customer_id JOIN drinks d ON cd.drink_id = d.drink_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY favorite_drink DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Coffee';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, drink_name FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_drinks ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_drinks.customer_id JOIN drinks ON customer_drinks.drink_id = drinks.drink_id;
SELECT * FROM drinks WHERE drink_name LIKE '%Tea%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, allergies FROM customer_profiles LEFT JOIN allergies ON customer_profiles.allergies = allergies.allergy_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, favorite_drink FROM customer_profiles WHERE favorite_drink = 'Coffee';
SELECT customer_id, drink_name, category FROM drinks WHERE category = 'Juice';
SELECT customer_id, allergy_name FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_allergies ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_allergies.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, category FROM customer_profiles, drinks WHERE customer_id = drink_id;
SELECT customer_id, drink_name, calories FROM customer_profiles JOIN drinks ON customer_id = drink_id WHERE calories < 100;

SELECT customer_id, name, allergy_name FROM customer_profiles JOIN allergies JOIN customer_allergies ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_allergies.customer_id AND allergies.allergy_id = customer_allergies.allergy_id;
